SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class PlayArea

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.PlayArea
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameSubject
public class PlayArea extends Object implements GameSubject
This class represents the play-area of a player: the space within which the cards are placed. In this representation it is comprehensive of the visible resources and a list containing, all the free corners on which placement is possible.

    • placeCard

      public PlayCard placeCard(@NotNull @NotNull PlayCard playCard, @NotNull @NotNull Corner corner) throws IllegalStateException
      Places a card in cardMatrix and occupies corners, updates visibleResources and freeCorners
      Parameters:
      playCard - ResourceCard or GoldCard to be placed
      corner - which corner (in FreeCorner) to place it on
      Returns:
      placed card
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the placement is invalid
